comment.author: 86916510@N00
comment._content: Step right up ladies and gents! Have I got something for you!

comment.author: 7892196@N02
comment._content: I think this is a photograph of the Victorian "Better Farming Train" - there is a U van in the photograph.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/7892196@N02] Yes! The album is of the Victorian Better Farming Train. State Records NSW received the album as part of the NRS 17420 - State Rail Authority Archives Photographic Reference Print Collection. You can have a look through the whole of the album here: investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as...
